instructions: Download the Shortcuts app from the App Store. In your iPhone browser, tap the Spotify Siri download link . Tap Get Shortcut to install it, then tap Open to open the Shortcuts app. In your library, you'll find the Spotify Siri shortcut. Tap the three dots to open the editing screen, then tap the Settings icon. Tap Add to Siri to enable the Spotify Siri shortcuts. On the next screen, tap the record icon to record your initial Siri phrase. You can choose something like "Spotify Siri" or "Play Spotify." Tap Done twice. Now, when you activate Siri and say your shortcut phrase, Siri will open Shortcuts and display a box called Dictation Text . Finally, say the song or artist you're looking for and Siri will open Spotify and take action.
